# Documentation Queue

Potential documentation sources to ingest.

## Tier 1: Critical (Must Have)

| Source | URL | Why | Priority |
|--------|-----|-----|----------|
| MCP Specification | https://modelcontextprotocol.io | Core protocol for Claude Code integrations | HIGH |
| Anthropic API | https://docs.anthropic.com/en/api | Core API reference | HIGH |
| Claude Code | https://code.claude.com/docs | Already done âœ“ | DONE |

## Tier 2: High Value (Should Have)

| Source | URL | Why | Priority |
|--------|-----|-----|----------|
| Vercel AI SDK | https://sdk.vercel.ai/docs | Common AI/LLM framework | MEDIUM |
| LangChain | https://python.langchain.com/docs | Popular AI orchestration | MEDIUM |
| OpenAI API | https://platform.openai.com/docs | Industry standard reference | MEDIUM |
| Supabase | https://supabase.com/docs | Database + auth (used in Blackbox5) | MEDIUM |
| n8n | https://docs.n8n.io | Workflow automation (used in Blackbox5) | MEDIUM |

| TypeScript | https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs | Language | LOW |

| Source | URL | Why | Priority |
|--------|-----|-----|----------|

## Proposed Next 3

1. **MCP Specification** - Critical for understanding Claude Code's integration system
2. **Vercel AI SDK** - Common framework we might use
3. **Supabase** - Already used in Blackbox5, good to have docs

## Notes

- Check each site for `llms.txt` or `sitemap.xml` before adding
- Some may require different discovery strategies
- Consider API docs vs guide docs distinction
